name: Concession Oils Golden Canola
description: Concession Oils Golden Canola is a premium and versatile fat and oil ingredient that is widely used in the food and nutrition industry, particularly in bakery applications. This canola oil serves as a healthier alternative to traditional fats and oils, offering a rich buttery flavor that enhances the taste of various products. With its allergen-free and GMO-free labeling claims, Golden Canola meets the requirements of health-conscious consumers. It is also certified kosher and complies with The Food Allergen Labeling and Consumer Protection Act of 2004 (FALCPA) regulations. Golden Canola is available in a variety of packaging options, including boxes, bags, bulk, drums, totes, and pails, providing convenience and flexibility in storage and usage. The ingredient list includes canola oil, beta-carotene, natural and artificial flavors, as well as tertiary butylhydroquinone (TBHQ) and polydimethylsiloxane.

Certifications & Compliance: The Food Allergen Labeling & Consumer Protection Act of 2004 (FALCPA)
